service.query: SELECT A.STR_CD , C.DEPT_CD , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME(A.STR_CD, C.DEPT_CD, C.TEAM_CD, '00','00') AS TEAM_ORG_NAME , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME(A.STR_CD, C.DEPT_CD, C.TEAM_CD, C.PC_CD,'00') AS PC_ORG_NAME , G.VEN_CD , G.VEN_NAME , A.PUMBUN_CD , F.PUMBUN_NAME , DPS.FN_GET_FLOOR_NM(F.FLOR_CD) FLOOR_NM , A.EVENT_FLAG , A.EVENT_RATE , A.MG_RATE , A.TOT_SALE_AMT , A.REDU_AMT , A.NORM_SALE_AMT AS SALE_AMT , A.DC_AMT , A.NET_SALE_AMT , A.SALE_PROF_AMT /* , (CASE WHEN NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(A.SALE_PROF_AMT,0)/NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT,0)*100 END) AS PROFRATE */ , (CASE WHEN NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(A.SALE_PROF_AMT,0)/NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT,0)*100 END) AS PROFRATE FROM ( SELECT STR_CD , DPS.FN_GET_PBNORGCD('5', STR_CD, PUMBUN_CD, ?) AS ORG_CD , PUMBUN_CD , EVENT_FLAG , EVENT_RATE , MG_RATE , SUM(NVL(TOT_SALE_AMT,0)) AS TOT_SALE_AMT , SUM(NVL(REDU_AMT,0)) AS REDU_AMT , SUM(NVL(NORM_SALE_AMT,0)) AS NORM_SALE_AMT , SUM(NVL(DC_AMT,0)) AS DC_AMT , SUM(NVL(NET_SALE_AMT,0)) AS NET_SALE_AMT , SUM(NVL(ROUND(SALE_PROF_AMT/1.1,0),0)) AS SALE_PROF_AMT , SUM(NVL(ROUND(NORM_SALE_AMT/1.1,0),0)) AS NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT FROM DPS.PS_DAYMGPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND PUMBUN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND EVENT_FLAG LIKE ? || '%' AND EVENT_RATE LIKE ? || '%' GROUP BY STR_CD , PUMBUN_CD , EVENT_FLAG , EVENT_RATE , MG_RATE ) A , DPS.PC_STRPBN F , ( SELECT DISTINCT STR_CD , DEPT_CD , TEAM_CD , PC_CD , ORG_CD , PUMBUN_CD , USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = ? AND MYORG.DEPT_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND MYORG.TEAM_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND MYORG.PC_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) C , DPS.PC_VENMST G WHERE A.ORG_CD = C.ORG_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = C.PUMBUN_CD AND A.STR_CD = F.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = F.PUMBUN_CD AND F.VEN_CD = G.VEN_CD AND G.VEN_CD LIKE ? ||'%' /* AND H.PUMBUN_CD <> '210003' 2013.02.06 이승섭 대리요청 마리오 상품권 매출 제외 */

SELECT A.STR_CD , C.DEPT_CD , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME(A.STR_CD, C.DEPT_CD, '00', '00','00') AS TEAM_ORG_NAME , C.TEAM_CD , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME(A.STR_CD, C.DEPT_CD, C.TEAM_CD, '00','00') AS TEAM_ORG_NAME , C.PC_CD , DPS.FN_GET_ORG_NAME(A.STR_CD, C.DEPT_CD, C.TEAM_CD, C.PC_CD,'00') AS PC_ORG_NAME , G.VEN_CD , MAX(G.VEN_NAME) AS VEN_NAME , H.REP_PUMBUN_CD , DPS.FN_GET_PUMBUN_NAME(H.REP_PUMBUN_CD) AS REP_PUMBUN_NAME , DPS.FN_GET_FLOOR_NM(F.FLOR_CD) FLOOR_NM , '' AS PUMBUN_CD --> 그리드에서 숨김 , '' AS PUMBUN_NAME --> 그리드에서 숨김 , '' AS PUMMOK_CD --> 그리드에서 숨김 , '' AS PUMMOK_NAME --> 그리드에서 숨김 , A.EVENT_FLAG , A.EVENT_RATE , A.MG_RATE , SUM(A.TOT_SALE_AMT ) AS TOT_SALE_AMT , SUM(A.REDU_AMT ) AS REDU_AMT , SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) AS SALE_AMT , SUM(A.DC_AMT ) AS DC_AMT , SUM(A.NET_SALE_AMT ) AS NET_SALE_AMT , SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) AS SALE_PROF_AMT /* , (CASE WHEN SUM(NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT,0)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(NVL(A.SALE_PROF_AMT,0))/SUM(NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT,0))*100 END) AS PROFRATE */ , (CASE WHEN SUM(NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT,0)) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(NVL(A.SALE_PROF_AMT,0))/SUM(NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT,0))*100 END) AS PROFRATE , ? AS UNIT FROM ( SELECT STR_CD , DPS.FN_GET_PBNORGCD('5', STR_CD, PUMBUN_CD, '1') AS ORG_CD , PUMBUN_CD , EVENT_FLAG , EVENT_RATE , MG_RATE , SUM(NVL(TOT_SALE_AMT,0)) AS TOT_SALE_AMT , SUM(NVL(REDU_AMT,0)) AS REDU_AMT , SUM(NVL(NORM_SALE_AMT,0)) AS NORM_SALE_AMT , SUM(NVL(DC_AMT,0)) AS DC_AMT , SUM(NVL(NET_SALE_AMT,0)) AS NET_SALE_AMT , SUM(NVL(ROUND(SALE_PROF_AMT/1.1,0),0)) AS SALE_PROF_AMT , SUM(NVL(ROUND(NORM_SALE_AMT/1.1,0),0)) AS NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT FROM DPS.PS_DAYMGPBN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND SALE_DT BETWEEN ? AND ? AND PUMBUN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND EVENT_FLAG LIKE ? || '%' AND EVENT_RATE LIKE ? || '%' GROUP BY STR_CD , PUMBUN_CD , EVENT_FLAG , EVENT_RATE , MG_RATE ) A , DPS.PC_STRPBN F , DPS.PC_PBNMST H , ( SELECT DISTINCT STR_CD , DEPT_CD , TEAM_CD , PC_CD , ORG_CD , PUMBUN_CD , USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = ?
